apiKey.description: API key to access OpenAI GPT API.

anthropicKey.description: API key to access Anthropic Claude API.

geminiKey.description: API key to access Google Gemini API.

openrouterKey.description: API key to access OpenRouter API.

customUrl.description: Base URL for Custom OpenAI-compatible provider.

emulate.description: Setting to enable or disable emulation mode.

overwriteField.description: If true, overwrite the target field. If false, append to it.

flatMenu.description: If true, show items directly in the root context menu.

obfuscateCreds.description: If true, obfuscate the credentials.json file.

prompt.description: Template of the prompt to be sent to the GPT API. You can use field names in a form {{{FIELD_NAME}}}. Such placeholders will be replaced to the content of the corresponding fields.

targetField.description: Field name where the GPT response should be stored.

responseFormat.description: Format of the response expected from the LLM.

fieldMapping.description: Mapping of JSON keys to Anki fields (used when responseFormat is json).

pinned.description: If true, this prompt will be pinned to the top level context menu.
If true, this pipeline will be pinned to the top level context menu.

maxFavorites.description: Maximum number of favorite/history items to show in the context menu.

history.description: List of names of recently used prompts.

description: Schema for the configuration of Anki AI Add-on.
